name: Pivot²
description:
Start as a small cube with only the ability to spin. Add and remove cubes to adapt to your environment and navigate the level by spinning, swinging and pole vaulting.

Controls:

  • A and D to spin
  • Click to place a cube.
  • Click a cube to remove it.
  • Click on the yellow cube to remove all placed cubes.
  • Send the yellow cube into the green zone to complete a level.
